dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: Based on my role as a villager and my goal to find the assassin, I would suggest we focus on gathering information about each other's actions and behaviors during this game to help us make an informed decision when it comes time to vote.

dialogue.message: Given that Bob is known to be the detective, it would be wise for me to keep a low profile and avoid drawing unnecessary attention to myself. I'll focus on blending in with the villagers and not arouse any suspicion.
